name: Moroch Partners
description:
Founded in 1981, Moroch is an independent, integrated marketing agency based in Dallas, TX. With dozens of offices across the country, Moroch’s one-of-a-kind agency footprint places their employees on the front lines, which gives the agency the ability to work with national accounts while executing locally.
In its 36th year, Moroch’s integration model includes expertise in creative, digital and social media, planning and analytics, media, multicultural, experiential and PR all under one roof, working together on behalf of over 100 brands.
